18  package org.apache.shardingsphere.sharding.cache.checker;
19  
20  import com.github.benmanes.caffeine.cache.Caffeine;
21  import com.github.benmanes.caffeine.cache.LoadingCache;
22  import com.google.common.collect.Range;
23  import lombok.EqualsAndHashCode;
24  import lombok.Getter;
25  import org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.binder.context.segment.insert.keygen.GeneratedKeyContext;
26  import org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.binder.context.statement.SQLStatementContext;
27  import org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.binder.context.statement.dml.DeleteStatementContext;
28  import org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.binder.context.statement.dml.InsertStatementContext;
29  import org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.binder.context.statement.dml.SelectStatementContext;
30  import org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.binder.context.statement.dml.UpdateStatementContext;
31  import org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.binder.context.type.TableAvailable;
32  import org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.metadata.database.ShardingSphereDatabase;
33  import org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.session.query.QueryContext;
34  import org.apache.shardingsphere.sharding.api.config.cache.ShardingCacheOptionsConfiguration;
35  import org.apache.shardingsphere.sharding.cache.ShardingCache;
36  import org.apache.shardingsphere.sharding.cache.checker.algorithm.CacheableShardingAlgorithmChecker;
37  import org.apache.shardingsphere.sharding.route.engine.condition.ShardingCondition;
38  import org.apache.shardingsphere.sharding.route.engine.condition.engine.InsertClauseShardingConditionEngine;
39  import org.apache.shardingsphere.sharding.route.engine.condition.engine.WhereClauseShardingConditionEngine;
40  import org.apache.shardingsphere.sharding.route.engine.condition.value.ListShardingConditionValue;
41  import org.apache.shardingsphere.sharding.route.engine.condition.value.RangeShardingConditionValue;
42  import org.apache.shardingsphere.sharding.route.engine.condition.value.ShardingConditionValue;
43  import org.apache.shardingsphere.sharding.rule.ShardingRule;
44  import org.apache.shardingsphere.sharding.rule.ShardingTable;
45  import org.apache.shardingsphere.sharding.spi.ShardingAlgorithm;
46  import org.apache.shardingsphere.sql.parser.statement.core.segment.dml.assignment.InsertValuesSegment;
47  import org.apache.shardingsphere.sql.parser.statement.core.segment.dml.expr.ExpressionSegment;
48  import org.apache.shardingsphere.sql.parser.statement.core.segment.dml.expr.simple.LiteralExpressionSegment;
49  import org.apache.shardingsphere.sql.parser.statement.core.segment.dml.expr.simple.ParameterMarkerExpressionSegment;
50  import org.apache.shardingsphere.timeservice.core.rule.TimestampServiceRule;
51  
52  import java.util.ArrayList;
53  import java.util.Collection;
54  import java.util.Collections;
55  import java.util.HashSet;
56  import java.util.List;
57  import java.util.Set;
58  import java.util.TreeSet;
59  
60  /**
61   * Sharding route cacheable checker.
62   */
63  public final class ShardingRouteCacheableChecker {
64      
65      private final ShardingRule shardingRule;
66      
67      private final TimestampServiceRule timestampServiceRule;
68      
69      private final LoadingCache<Key, ShardingRouteCacheableCheckResult> checkingCache;
70      
71      public ShardingRouteCacheableChecker(final ShardingCache shardingCache) {
72          shardingRule = shardingCache.getShardingRule();
73          timestampServiceRule = shardingCache.getTimestampServiceRule();
74          checkingCache = buildCache(shardingCache.getConfiguration().getRouteCache());
75      }
76      
77      private LoadingCache<Key, ShardingRouteCacheableCheckResult> buildCache(final ShardingCacheOptionsConfiguration cacheOptions) {
78          Caffeine<Object, Object> result = Caffeine.newBuilder().initialCapacity(cacheOptions.getInitialCapacity()).maximumSize(cacheOptions.getMaximumSize());
79          if (cacheOptions.isSoftValues()) {
80              result.softValues();
81          }
82          return result.build(this::load);
83      }
84      
85      private ShardingRouteCacheableCheckResult load(final Key key) {
86          SQLStatementContext sqlStatementContext = key.getSqlStatementContext();
87          ShardingRouteCacheableCheckResult result;
88          if (sqlStatementContext instanceof SelectStatementContext) {
89              result = checkSelectCacheable((SelectStatementContext) sqlStatementContext, key.getParameters(), key.getDatabase());
90          } else if (sqlStatementContext instanceof UpdateStatementContext) {
91              result = checkUpdateCacheable((UpdateStatementContext) sqlStatementContext, key.getParameters(), key.getDatabase());
92          } else if (sqlStatementContext instanceof InsertStatementContext) {
93              result = checkInsertCacheable((InsertStatementContext) sqlStatementContext, key.getParameters(), key.getDatabase());
94          } else if (sqlStatementContext instanceof DeleteStatementContext) {
95              result = checkDeleteCacheable((DeleteStatementContext) sqlStatementContext, key.getParameters(), key.getDatabase());
96          } else {
97              result = new ShardingRouteCacheableCheckResult(false, Collections.emptyList());
98          }
99          key.getParameters().clear();
100         return result;
101     }
102     
103     private ShardingRouteCacheableCheckResult checkSelectCacheable(final SelectStatementContext statementContext, final List<Object> params, final ShardingSphereDatabase database) {
104         Collection<String> tableNames = new HashSet<>(statementContext.getTablesContext().getTableNames());
105         if (!shardingRule.isAllShardingTables(tableNames)) {
106             return new ShardingRouteCacheableCheckResult(false, Collections.emptyList());
107         }
108         if (1 != tableNames.size() && !shardingRule.isAllBindingTables(tableNames) || containsNonCacheableShardingAlgorithm(tableNames)) {
109             return new ShardingRouteCacheableCheckResult(false, Collections.emptyList());
110         }
111         List<ShardingCondition> shardingConditions = new WhereClauseShardingConditionEngine(database, shardingRule, timestampServiceRule).createShardingConditions(statementContext, params);
112         return checkShardingConditionsCacheable(shardingConditions);
113     }
114     
115     private ShardingRouteCacheableCheckResult checkUpdateCacheable(final UpdateStatementContext statementContext, final List<Object> params, final ShardingSphereDatabase database) {
116         return checkUpdateOrDeleteCacheable(statementContext, params, database);
117     }
118     
119     private ShardingRouteCacheableCheckResult checkInsertCacheable(final InsertStatementContext statementContext, final List<Object> params, final ShardingSphereDatabase database) {
120         Collection<String> tableNames = statementContext.getTablesContext().getTableNames();
121         if (1 != tableNames.size() || null != statementContext.getInsertSelectContext() || null != statementContext.getOnDuplicateKeyUpdateValueContext()
122                 || statementContext.getGeneratedKeyContext().map(GeneratedKeyContext::isGenerated).orElse(false)) {
123             return new ShardingRouteCacheableCheckResult(false, Collections.emptyList());
124         }
125         boolean isShardingTable = shardingRule.isAllShardingTables(tableNames);
126         if (!isShardingTable || containsNonCacheableShardingAlgorithm(tableNames)) {
127             return new ShardingRouteCacheableCheckResult(false, Collections.emptyList());
128         }
129         Collection<InsertValuesSegment> values = statementContext.getSqlStatement().getValues();
130         if (1 != values.size()) {
131             return new ShardingRouteCacheableCheckResult(false, Collections.emptyList());
132         }
133         InsertValuesSegment valueSegment = values.iterator().next();
134         for (ExpressionSegment each : valueSegment.getValues()) {
135             if (!(each instanceof ParameterMarkerExpressionSegment || each instanceof LiteralExpressionSegment)) {
136                 return new ShardingRouteCacheableCheckResult(false, Collections.emptyList());
137             }
138         }
139         List<ShardingCondition> shardingConditions = new InsertClauseShardingConditionEngine(database, shardingRule, timestampServiceRule).createShardingConditions(statementContext, params);
140         return checkShardingConditionsCacheable(shardingConditions);
141     }
142     
143     private ShardingRouteCacheableCheckResult checkDeleteCacheable(final DeleteStatementContext statementContext, final List<Object> params, final ShardingSphereDatabase database) {
144         return checkUpdateOrDeleteCacheable(statementContext, params, database);
145     }
146     
147     private ShardingRouteCacheableCheckResult checkUpdateOrDeleteCacheable(final SQLStatementContext sqlStatementContext, final List<Object> params, final ShardingSphereDatabase database) {
148         Collection<String> tableNames = ((TableAvailable) sqlStatementContext).getTablesContext().getTableNames();
149         if (1 != tableNames.size()) {
150             return new ShardingRouteCacheableCheckResult(false, Collections.emptyList());
151         }
152         boolean isShardingTable = shardingRule.isAllShardingTables(tableNames);
153         if (!isShardingTable || containsNonCacheableShardingAlgorithm(tableNames)) {
154             return new ShardingRouteCacheableCheckResult(false, Collections.emptyList());
155         }
156         List<ShardingCondition> shardingConditions = new WhereClauseShardingConditionEngine(database, shardingRule, timestampServiceRule).createShardingConditions(sqlStatementContext, params);
157         return checkShardingConditionsCacheable(shardingConditions);
158     }
159     
160     private boolean containsNonCacheableShardingAlgorithm(final Collection<String> logicTables) {
161         for (String each : logicTables) {
162             ShardingTable shardingTable = shardingRule.getShardingTable(each);
163             String databaseShardingAlgorithmName = shardingRule.getDatabaseShardingStrategyConfiguration(shardingTable).getShardingAlgorithmName();
164             ShardingAlgorithm databaseShardingAlgorithm = shardingRule.getShardingAlgorithms().get(databaseShardingAlgorithmName);
165             if (null != databaseShardingAlgorithm && !CacheableShardingAlgorithmChecker.isCacheableShardingAlgorithm(databaseShardingAlgorithm)) {
166                 return true;
167             }
168             String tableShardingAlgorithmName = shardingRule.getTableShardingStrategyConfiguration(shardingTable).getShardingAlgorithmName();
169             ShardingAlgorithm tableShardingAlgorithm = shardingRule.getShardingAlgorithms().get(tableShardingAlgorithmName);
170             if (null != tableShardingAlgorithm && !CacheableShardingAlgorithmChecker.isCacheableShardingAlgorithm(tableShardingAlgorithm)) {
171                 return true;
172             }
173         }
174         return false;
175     }
176     
177     private static ShardingRouteCacheableCheckResult checkShardingConditionsCacheable(final List<ShardingCondition> shardingConditions) {
178         Set<Integer> result = new TreeSet<>();
179         for (ShardingCondition each : shardingConditions) {
180             for (ShardingConditionValue conditionValue : each.getValues()) {
181                 if (!isConditionTypeCacheable(conditionValue)) {
182                     return new ShardingRouteCacheableCheckResult(false, Collections.emptyList());
183                 }
184                 result.addAll(conditionValue.getParameterMarkerIndexes());
185             }
186         }
187         return new ShardingRouteCacheableCheckResult(true, new ArrayList<>(result));
188     }
189     
190     private static boolean isConditionTypeCacheable(final ShardingConditionValue conditionValue) {
191         if (conditionValue instanceof ListShardingConditionValue<?>) {
192             for (Object eachValue : ((ListShardingConditionValue<?>) conditionValue).getValues()) {
193                 if (!(eachValue instanceof Number)) {
194                     return false;
195                 }
196             }
197         }
198         if (conditionValue instanceof RangeShardingConditionValue<?>) {
199             Range<?> range = ((RangeShardingConditionValue<?>) conditionValue).getValueRange();
200             return range.lowerEndpoint() instanceof Number && range.upperEndpoint() instanceof Number;
201         }
202         return true;
203     }
204     
205     /**
206      * Check if query is cacheable.
207      *
208      * @param database database
209      * @param queryContext query context
210      * @return is cacheable
211      */
212     public ShardingRouteCacheableCheckResult check(final ShardingSphereDatabase database, final QueryContext queryContext) {
213         return checkingCache.get(new Key(database, queryContext.getSql(), queryContext.getSqlStatementContext(), queryContext.getParameters()));
214     }
215     
216     @EqualsAndHashCode(of = "sql")
217     @Getter
218     private static final class Key {
219         
220         private final ShardingSphereDatabase database;
221         
222         private final String sql;
223         
224         private final SQLStatementContext sqlStatementContext;
225         
226         private final List<Object> parameters;
227         
228         private Key(final ShardingSphereDatabase database, final String sql, final SQLStatementContext sqlStatementContext, final List<Object> params) {
229             this.database = database;
230             this.sql = sql;
231             this.sqlStatementContext = sqlStatementContext;
232             parameters = new ArrayList<>(params);
233         }
234     }
235 }
